text: Snapple is a flavored beverage in the United States. It was created in 1972 and is owned by the company Keurig Dr Pepper. It is based in Plano, Texas. == Other websites == * Snapple website Category:1970s establishments in Texas Category:1972 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Texas Category:Plano, Texas Category:American drink companies
title: Snapple
